name: "To Love and Die in Dixie" Quiz / Test | 'Family Guy'- Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which girl's birthday party does Chris want to go to?
questions.explanation:
Barbara's party.

	Chris is invited to the party, and he decides that he wants to get Barbara a gift by himself.

questions.text: What does Chris do to earn money?
questions.explanation:
Ride a paper route.

	Chris decides to get a paper route to earn money for Barbara's gift.  Chris ends up meeting a creepy old guy, and gets his bike stolen in a robbery.

questions.text: What present does Chris buy for the birthday girl?
questions.explanation:
Perfume.

	He says that the perfume is supposed to make people smell like Elizabeth Taylor.  Chris ends up spraying the perfume in Barbara's eyes and she screams at him.

questions.text: What number is the convenience store robber in the police line-up?
questions.explanation:
Six.

	Although police assure Chris that he's safe, Peter goes into the room and tells the robber who Chris is and gives him a picture with his school schedule and a list of his fears on the back.

questions.text: What town are the Griffins relocated to?
questions.explanation:
Bumblescum.

	Bumblescum is a town in the very deep south.  Their population is only fifty-four people.

A pond.

	Chris and Sam soon become friends.  Sam's grandfather died in the pond because he saw his reflection, thought he was drowning, and tried to save himself.

questions.text: What jobs do Peter and Brian get in their new town?
questions.explanation:
Sheriffs.

	Lois states that Peter needs to bring the family extra income, so Brian and Peter find a job where they can sleep, drink beer, and eat pie.

questions.text: Is Sam a boy or a girl?
questions.explanation:
girl.

	After being freaked out when Sam kisses him, Chris discovers that Sam is actually a girl who looks like a boy.  He soon loves Sam.

Quagmire.

	Quagmire can be seen running in the background of the party being held at the Griffins' house while the FBI agents are staying there.

questions.text: What animal seems to pop up in awkward places in this episode?
questions.explanation:
A raccoon.

	The raccoon appears inside the Griffins' TV, in Lois' shirt, inside the fridge, and even inside Peter's gun.
